data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Rio Grande do Sul. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 2,667,372 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Rio Grande do Sul to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Rio Grande do Sul, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Ajuru people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Rio Grande do Sul to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: the state of Rio Grande do Sul has (about) 2,667,372 people who know Jesus, 6,935,080 people who know about him culturally, and 1,093,048 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil has a population of 10,695,500.

We estimate Rio Grande do Sul has 2,667,372 people who might know Jesus, 6,935,080 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,093,048 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Rio Grande do Sul, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
